name: Starving
description:
It’s an arcade game with logical elements, in which life of a small zombie is in your hand, and it’s wandering the game world in the hopes of coping with the hard trials that befell it.
The game consists of 30 levels with a small number of traps, where your main task is to pass them, counting on your sense of distance and reflexes only. If you can handle it, you will find a rather unexpected ending.
